text: Is there any backend that can handle a lot of points when scatter plotting, preferably a bit interactive (over 500k points, also support alphas on the markers)

elements.text: Is there any backend that can handle a lot of points when scatter plotting, preferably a bit interactive (over 500k points, also support alphas on the markers)

text:
I would try `gr(format=:png)`

Else I hear InspectDR is good for lots of points.

Else Makie?
